trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_000<tab>We're very close to devising a way to further augment your magia board. If you call again in a while, I should be able to offer you the benefits.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_Q1_000_000<tab>What would you like to do?
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_A1_000_001<tab>Further augment your magia board.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_A1_000_002<tab>Ask about further augmentation.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_A1_000_003<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_010<tab>I should be happy to further augment your magia board, should you have the requisite materials in your possession. Do you...?
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_020<tab>Alas, it seems that you do not. A thousand pardons, but since I have no stock myself, I cannot assist you at this time.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>In order to further augment your magia board, you must possess <var 31 ((Item)) 02F260F10202 /var>, <var 31 ((Item)) 02F260F20202 /var>, and <var 31 ((Item)) 02F260F30202 /var>.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_030<tab>Oh, so you do. Though, if I am to begin, you will of course need to give them over to me, if you would be so kind...

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_031<tab>Very good, very good. Now then, if you'll hand me your magia board, I'll get started right away. Rest assured this will only take a moment...
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_032<tab>'Tis done! I present to you your magia board, along with a seventh magicite, which you may now affix to it if you so desire.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_033<tab>Do bear in mind, however, that you may still only use up to five magicite to strengthen your affinity with a given element.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you ask about?
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_A2_000_001<tab>Further magia board augmentation.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_A2_000_002<tab>Required materials.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_A2_000_003<tab>Affixing a seventh magicite.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_A2_000_004<tab>Nothing.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_040<tab>We've devised a simple method by which an additional seventh magicite can be safely affixed to your magia board. Surely I needn't explain the advantages of being able to do so!
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>Through further magia board augmentation, you can increase the maximum number of magicite which can be affixed to it.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_SYSTEM_100_041<tab>Having your magia board first augmented in <var 28 ((ContentFinderCondition)) E8022B /var> is not a prerequisite.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_050<tab>The augmentation procedure is not terribly difficult in of itself, but it does require a number of resources that I do not have at present. I'm afraid you'll have to go and procure them yourself.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>In order to further augment your magia board, you must possess <var 31 ((Item)) 02F260F10202 /var>, <var 31 ((Item)) 02F260F20202 /var>, and <var 31 ((Item)) 02F260F30202 /var>.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_060<tab>I have an extra magicite I can give to you once I've finished augmenting your magia board. Similarly to the previous stone I supplied, it has been specially treated and is no different from the others you use in conjunction with your board.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_SYSTEM_000_061<tab>The seventh magicite that you may affix to an augmented magia board is functionally the same as the other six and confers no additional benefits.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_SYSTEM_000_062<tab>However, due to the design of the magia board, you may use no more than five to strengthen your affinity with a given element.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_070<tab>Through innovation and ingenuity, we will strive to make even further augmentation possible! ...Or not. Alas, we may have reached the limits of the magia board.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_100_070<tab>Oh? It appears your magia board still has room for improvement. You can augment it with the materials found in Pyros, should you be so inclined.
